articles.author: Staff Report
articles.title: NASCAR officials issue one-race suspension to Austin Hill for Indy crash - NASCAR.com
articles.description: NASCAR officials penalized Xfinity Series driver Austin Hill, suspending him for one race for his actions in Saturday's race in Indianapolis.
articles.content:
NASCAR officials penalized Xfinity Series driver Austin Hill on Tuesday, suspending him for one race for his actions in last Saturday’s race at Indianapolis Motor Speedway.
